channel.title: Dedicated server app id 346680 does not use "bms/custom/*/maps " folder tree
channel.description:
Dedicated server app id 346680 does not use "custom/*/maps " folder tree, anything added I.E. custom map in maps folder returns "map not found" on server.
This is good to keep custom stuff/settings separate from updates.
Thanks
